official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel ABORIGINAL.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
